group_1.textLeft: Phew!@[chara:303101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Much better!

group_1.textRight: Did anything I said get through to you?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, totally!
From here on out, I totally @intend to stop doing this!

group_1.textRight: Stop being the key word there...

group_1.textLeft: I just had some pent-up rage today!
Yeah, actually...@I broke up with my girlfriend.

group_1.textRight: Because it all felt too fake?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there was that.@[chara:303101:lipSynch_0]...[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]
But also...
I'd liked her for sooo long, y'know?@We've been friends since we were kids.
So that was, like...@Four years of a one-sided relationship.

group_1.textRight: Who knew you could be so dedicated...

group_1.textLeft: Who knew?! I'll have you know, I—
Anyway for those four long years—
I was secretly admiring her, pretending@to be just a normal friend.
So when Kyubey showed up I could've said,
"No way! I don't need magic!"@I could've endured it…
But...
I met Kyubey right after I learned@she'd gotten her first boyfriend...
It really hit home...

group_1.narration: She was all...@"We don't need men—we've got each other!"@...and...@"Lovers come and go, but friends are forever!"@...and stuff.
But then she got a boyfriend, and I saw what@she looked like when she talked about him...

group_1.textLeft: I knew I'd lost.[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]
She just looked so happy.@No, not just happy, or excited...
She was, like...in love, I guess.@That's when it hit me...
I'd never make her that happy, no@matter how close we were as friends.
It hit me so hard, I decided to become@a Magical Girl to make her love me.
Weirdly enough...
Her boyfriend was also the reason I thought@we should break up.
